attributes.action: Make Sure that only british laws passed by parliament become law in the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Only Laws made and Passed by a United Kingdom Parliament should become Law in the United Kingdom.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
